q: the paper. In testimony at a perjury trial last month, Andy Coulson professed his innocence: ''Sheridan asked whether he know what the phrase ''the dark arts'' meant. Andy Coulson replied: As far as I'm concerned it means investigative work. ''I think others have described it as meaning illegal work. All I can tell you is that as far as my reporters are concerned the instructions were very clear: they were to work within the law and within the PCC code. It's in their handbooks.'' Philadelphia has alternated wins and losses in its last six games after losing nine of 10. The Sixers, who opened the season 10-0 at the First Union Center, are 1-7 in their last eight home games. This is not the team we thought we were going to have, Sixers coach Larry Brown said, referring to injuries that have hampered the team. Philadelphia, which trailed by 18 in the second quarter, closed to 50-47 following a three-point play by Allen Iverson early in the third.

the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks. ''With everything going on, I wanted to play well,'' Allen Iverson said. I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here. Allen Iverson was benched by Pistons coach Mike Rowe Curry to begin the game, punishment for missing a mandatory team practice on Thanksgiving. his perspective as Pentagon chief under then-president George W Bush. Donald Rumsfeld was regarded as the chief architect of the war in Iraq.
